title: Exquisite Diamond Vanki/Armlet Pendant - A Touch of Telugu Tradition
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds. Approximate clarity: VVS-SI. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and a rich
features: Inspired by the classic Vanki armlet design, this pendant features a crescent shape adorned with intricate diamond setting. The design evokes traditional Telugu jewelry motifs. Each diamond is carefully prong-set to maximize brilliance and sparkle.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with dazzling white diamonds
creating a beautiful contrast that enhances the visual appeal.
occasions: or as a treasured heirloom piece. Can be styled both for traditional and contemporary events.
description: This pendant seamlessly blends traditional Telugu design with modern diamond jewelry craftsmanship. Its timeless elegance, high-quality materials, and exquisite detailing make it a truly special piece to cherish for generations. The Vanki design is considered auspicious, representing prosperity and good fortune.
